name: Cargation
description:
CARGATION is a short game developed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the thematic "STRONGER TOGETHER". 

In this game we decided to do something like a double dash game with bosses and using path finding.

RULES: 

  • You play with two charges that are stronger when ones gets closer to the other.
  • The charges constantly are shotting. 
  • Your only work its give them the best path to get closer.
  • If a charge touch the end of the path the game overs
  • Use keys "A" and "D" to put the new path into once of the charge's path
